      • authenticate

        AuthenticationResult authenticate(java.util.Map<AuthenticationParams,java.lang.Object> params)
                           throws PluginException,
                                  ContextException
        Tries to authenticate a user. The external authentication plugin must check validity of user credentials and return an internal username of the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        params - Authentication params
        Returns:
        Authentication result
        Throws:
        PluginException
        ContextException
